                   throws AuthorizationDeniedException
        Description copied from interface: RoleMemberSession
        Adds or updates a Role Member (use ID RoleMember.ROLE_MEMBER_ID_UNASSIGNED to assign when adding a RoleMember).
        Specified by:
        persist in interface RoleMemberSession
        Parameters:
        authenticationToken - token
        roleMember - member
        Returns:
        The persisted version of the role member (and null if the provided roleMember was null)
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - If access was denied to editing this role member or the referenced CA or Role.

                          RoleMember roleMember,
                          boolean requireNonImportantRoleMembership)
                   throws AuthorizationDeniedException

        Adds or updates a Role Member (use ID RoleMember.ROLE_MEMBER_ID_UNASSIGNED to assign when adding a RoleMember).
        Specified by:
        persist in interface RoleMemberSession
        Parameters:
        authenticationToken - token
        roleMember - member
        requireNonImportantRoleMembership - if true, this method will check that the admin does not decrease its own access by adding/modifying this role
        Returns:
        The persisted version of the role member (and null if the provided roleMember was null)
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - If access was denied to editing this role member or the referenced CA or Role.
